SocialMediaPosting.headline: Mr. Alexander Slaughter’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope for a world where we have a collectivist approach to humanity rather than individualistic…”

– Mr. Alexander Slaughter, Music Educator @PropelSchools @mansfieldu @DUSchoolofEd https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/world-has-collectivist-approach-humanity/
